entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
